price: Au ndio wanasema: Ameitunga hii! Bali basi tu hawaamini!
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: Bali ati wanasema: Muhammad ameizua hii Qur'ani! Bali hawa kwa ukaidi wao hawaamini tu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna taqawwalahu bal lā yu'minūna
